title: Matthew Burger's Art Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

++++ Matthew Burger's Art Page

Art Page for select SCP's. Feel free to reach out to me if you'd like something done.

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-1730" hide="- SCP-1730"]]
[[include component:image-block
    name=samsara-attempt.jpg|
    caption=SCP-1730  MTF Tau-5 "Samsara" concepts, hard to say if this really falls in line for what "Samsara" are supposed to be however they were referred to as Power Rangers, cyborg and capable of being cloned|
    align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3456" hide="- SCP-3456"]]
[[include component:image-block
    name=SCP-3456.jpg|
    caption=SCP-3456 |
    align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-3608" hide="- SCP-3608"]]
[[include component:image-block
    name=scp-3608.jpg|
    caption=SCP-3608  One of my favorite D-Class characters from Doctor Fullham's otherworldly SCP entering a dark building...|
    align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-4205" hide="- SCP-4205"]]
[[include component:image-block
    name=SCP-4205.jpg|
    caption=SCP-4205   Wade and the broken window|
    align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-5140" hide="- SCP-5140"]]
[[include component:image-block
    name=scp-5140.jpg|
    caption=SCP-5140   I love this SCP, popped on the shining soundtrack and read it. I was pushing through the chills and I've been thinking of putting together some paints of the work for the past few days. Give it a read if you haven't yet|
    align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-5552" hide="- SCP-5552"]]
[[include component:image-block
    name=scp-5552.jpg|
    caption=SCP-5552 from the 6th document|
    align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]

Original Works

[[collapsible show="+ SCP Comic" hide="- SCP Comic"]]
[[include component:image-block
    name=comic-scp.jpg|
    caption=A late night idea for a comic|
    align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP Comic pg 2" hide="- SCP Comic pg 2"]]
[[include component:image-block
    name=image01.jpg|
    caption=Added another page! Lemme know what you guys think|
    align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]
